/**
 * @ngdoc directive
 * @name xui.directive:xuiDivider
 * @restrict E
 *
 * @description
 * XUI Divider can be used as a horizontal line divider.
 *
 * @parameters
 *
 * @example
 *    <example module="xui">
 *        <file src="src/components/divider/docs/divider-examples.html" name="index.html"></file>
 *        <file src="src/components/divider/docs/divider-examples.js" name="app.js"></file>
 *    </example>
 */
 
class Divider implements ng.IDirective {
    public restrict = "E";
    public templateUrl = "xui/components/divider/divider-directive.html";
    public replace = true;
    public transclude = false;
}
 
export default Divider;
